description.displayText: There's not enough words to describe how much Andrea has helped out my family. My daughter has Cerebral Palsy and Andrea always knew right away what my little girl needed.  She was always early to work and not once ever came late. If I ever needed her to come at a little earlier or stay a little bit longer, she never denied it. Whoever ends up with Andrea next, you will not be disappointed because she is truly the best human being you will ever meet and she will feel like she is part of your family.

Whoever ends up with Andrea next, you will not be disappointed because she is truly the best human being you will ever meet and she will feel like she is part of your family.
